title: Schema definitions for the REST API
description: The schema definitions for the messages passed between the agent and the device twin service

services.description: A list of services within the snap to take action on (or empty to apply to all)

url.description: A presigned S3 url to PUT a snapshot of a snap to
A presigned S3 url to PUT logs to

limit.description: The max number of logs to pull down from snapd api.

action.description: What action to take on the provided user

email.description: Ubuntu SSO email to use when creating a user

sudoer.description: Flag to indicate that the user being created should have sudoer access

force-managed.description: Force the creation of the user even if the device is managed by a single user

username.description: What username to remove from the device

snap.description: A snap that is required for a given model
